Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue/Nagaritha Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Melbourne Avenue and Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: This rather busy intersection is more or less the center of activity for the southeastern section of town. On the northwest corner of the inter- section is the Melbourne Entertainment Arena, where criminals and other degenerates are placed to be stoned, mutilated and killed. Surrounding the Arena are a number of small shops and stores where just about anything may be purchased.
